app_name: Groups Treatment Groups Apple Translate Universal Translator App
app_description: Do you have experienced language problems while traveling to another country Then this app is the solution to your problems. This app supports 90 languages. It included text to speech and speech to text converter. Features: Speak In the first Language and Listen in the Second Language Text to speech Speech to text Reverse Language Selection 90 Language Support Font Customization Select text from camera and image Copy translated text to clipboard to paste anywhere.
